Package server

Class ServerConnection

java.lang.Object
networking.SocketConnection
server.ServerConnection
public class ServerConnection extends SocketConnection
This class maintains/encapsulates the connection to the client, handles the input/output streams (because it subclasses SocketConnection), decodes/parses messages FROM THE CLIENT according to the protocol, and encodes/generates messages TO THE CLIENT according to the protocol.
